How to do clean docker restsrt instance

Теги:

How to do clean docker restsrt instance

Stop the container(s) using the following command:

docker-compose down Delete all containers using the following command:

docker rm -f $(docker ps -a -q) Delete all volumes using the following command:

docker volume rm $(docker volume ls -q)

Restart the containers using the following command:

docker-compose up -d

  • [docker]
  • [docker-compose]
